name: P B
text: The buffet is usually fresh and the staff stays busy stocking the steam table with fresh cooked pizzas, pastas, sauces and bread sticks. For about $7.00, the lunch buffet is a great deal.

name: Joshua Kress
text: It was alright, not the greatest. I ordered for delivery, didnt ask for card and they came to hotel door, gave pizza and asked for payment and I said I wasnt asked for payment, so I went to pizza hut and paid and had good conversation and …More

name: FwumpY
text: We came to this pizza hut not expecting too much, lunch time was dead and the price was extremely cheap.  The service was absolutely amazing, we were greeted by a worker named sheri with a great attitude and knowledgeable! She was on top of …More

name: Glendolyn Elliott
text: Fast food pizza is it the pizza shack of America??? You can make your own decisions.

name: Pat Decker
text: Lunch buffet is a good deal

name: Blake Gates
text: Always have good food. I recommend the bread sticks. I also like the personal pan pizzas.

name: stephanie Deverell
text: Seem to be short staffed. And prices are high. But was well taken care off.  Food was great and staff was friendly! Over all great experience. Loved the hustle and how well he kept positive and kept up.! I was very impressed. Been in food service for 20+ years! Great job!

name: Roy Nicolas
text: Love the stuff crust you can't go wrong with that

name: Dawn Cain
text: It wasn't actually busy at first but all of the sudden they got busy and I feel the staffing they had working tonight did a great job!! Food and salad bar was good!

name: Jayy
text: Good service n great food , has always been Hot and Fresh....Yum!

name: Mark Kallaus
text: Excellent service, food was good and fresh, and place was very clean.

name: AndiMarie McConnell
text: Came in for lunch 15 min before buffet closed. All employees were so polite as I apologized for being "that customer". I also told them not to worry about me, I'll grab what I need and get out of their way to break the buffet down. They handled it all perfectly! And left me alone as I asked. Thanks for a great lunch!

name: Kayla Davis
text: Ordered on line an picked up. Pizza was exactly as i ordered. Was ready when i got there.

name: Carol W
text: Excellent service, but menu needs updating, several items they no longer have & updates to the building need done, ceiling fans in sun room don’t work. Food & service were great!
